title: Hardware Technical Support Rep On Site
full_description: Are you a go-getter with a technical support background? Do you love to assist customers & solve technical issues? We have the job for you! APPLY TODAY! Job Title: Hardware Technical Support\Electrical Technician Location: Richardson, Texas Pay: $18/hr Schedule: Mon - Fri, Typical Business Hours Job Description:Performing system diagnosis and repairReplacing boards, loading software, testing and completing paperworkOffer excellent tech support via phonetroubleshooting for escalated customer service issuesDeliver excellent customer serviceDetermine the problems and solutionscommunicate issues to the supervisor/managerRequirements:HANDS ON experience1 to 3 years of technical support experience w/ Board swaps, testing with precision electronic equipmentKnowledge of RF, analog and digital circuitryAbility to determine and analyze problems quicklyAbility to diffuse issues with difficult customers Application Process Includes:Drug testingBackground check For immediate consideration, click the Apply Online button at the top of this page, then:If you are currently registered with CornerStone Staffing, click the I have a username and password and want to log in button to add yourself as a candidate to this job.If your are NOT currently registered with CornerStone Staffing, click the I need to register button to complete the application. #ZIP
